head.supplied: Melbourne, 14/7/76 ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ In reply to your letter yesterday ¶ I have the honor to acquaint you that the application of the Agricultural Society for an area of the Royal Park is still under consi...

div.p: A345 Royal Park Zoological Society letter & minute book, p.61, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

In reply to your letter yesterday
Letter not found, but see M to W. MacFarlane, 17 June 1876, and M to W. MacFarlane, 22 June 1876. I have the honor to acquaint you that the application of the Agricultural Society for an area of the Royal Park is still under consideration, and that as soon as a final decision on the subject has been arrived at by the Trustees I shall not fail to communicate with you.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be
